title: NewsBreak: White House May Offer Limited China Trade Deal: Report
text:
NewsBreak: White House May Offer Limited China Trade Deal: Report

Stock Markets 9 hours ago (Sep 12, 2019 16:16)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Officials in the Trump administration have discussed proposing a limited trade deal to China, Bloomberg reported Thursday, citing sources. The limited deal could delay or roll back some U.S. tariffs in return for Chinese promises on intellectual property and agriculture purchases. The plan was discussed by some of President Donald Trump’s top trade advisers ahead of trade talks in Washington in the coming weeks, the report said. The was up 0.55% in morning trading. The yield rose 0.8% to 1.747%. was down 1.5% to $54.92, off earlier lows.

NewsBreak: White House May Offer Limited China Trade Deal: Report
